name: Negative World (itch)
description: Negative World was inspired by Atari 2600 games of the late 70's to early 80's, such as Pitfall, and Adventure and more recent games like Pretentious Game to illustrate the feeling of isolation when striving towards ones goals with very little mechanics. Negative World is a 2D puzzle platformer designed to make and challenge the players actions and skills due to jumps being limited per level.
